yeezy.comment: They're certainly hyped, but I like them for their aesthetic. They look and feel totally unique from any other sneaker I've owned.

bballlow.comment: Common Projects are my favorite physical product I've owned: they're the best looking sneakers ever created. I have these in 3 colors.

blazer.comment: These look white, but are actually kinda faded pink. The European version of the blazer is one of the most underrated shoes out there.

gats.comment: These are the funkiest shoes I own. There's a multicolor paint splatter on the front, done by the designer.

cdg.comment: I like when designers take classic shapes and icons and add something small, like this CDG logo on the side of the otherwise standard Chucks.
